entities.name: VDM_Nexus_Approval_CLI
observations: Path: [approval_cli.py](VDM_Nexus/scripts/approval_cli.py:1) • Thin wrapper that shells to canonical approvals CLI; read-only wrapper, no secrets.
Policy: Env precedence CLI > env > .env; sets VDM_NEXUS=1; prompts handled by canonical CLI.

entities.name: Canonical_Approve_Tag_CLI
observations: Path: [approve_tag.py](Derivation/code/common/authorization/approve_tag.py:1) • Admin-gated approvals CLI (password prompt), updates approvals DB.

entities.name: Task_1_2_Validation_Plan
observations: Steps: (1) approval_cli.py check/print-env; (2) approve flow via run -- approve ...; (3) quarantine smoke with --allow-unapproved to produce failed_runs + policy JSON via io_paths.

entities.name: Quarantine_Routing_Policy
observations: Expectation: unapproved runs route artifacts to failed_runs/ with contradiction/policy receipts (JSON/CSV).

entities.name: Env_Precedence_Policy
observations: Rule: CLI flags > env (VDM_REPO_ROOT, VDM_APPROVAL_DB, VDM_APPROVAL_ADMIN_DB) > .env

entities.name: Memory_Bank_Update_2025-10-28
observations: Scope: adoption of approvals wrapper; documentation; pending Task 1.2 validation.

entities.name: Preflight_Fixed_Tag_Policy
observations: Rule: Preflight runs use fixed tag 'preflight' in DB rows.

entities.name: Test_Runtime_Guard_Forbids_Begin_Run_In_Tests
observations: Enforces preflight-only DB usage in tests; remediation message provided

entities.name: Static_Lint_Preflight_API_Checker
observations: Flags forbidden begin_run in tests; whitelists [test_preflight_guard.py](Derivation/code/tests/ci/test_preflight_guard.py:1)
Bandit-safe: avoids bare except/pass; logs warnings

entities.name: CI_Preflight_Guard_Test
observations: Asserts begin_run and begin_real_run blocked; begin_preflight_run allowed; validates get_latest_preflight; cleans DB file

entities.name: Results_DB_Preflight_Invariants_And_Helpers
observations: Added preflight column migration; variant alignment invariants; helpers: begin_preflight_run, begin_real_run, get_preflight_runs, get_latest_preflight, get_real_runs

entities.name: Preflight_DB_Route_And_Tag_Deprecation
observations: Route through begin_preflight_run; deprecate/ignore 'tag' in log_preflight; clarified docs

entities.name: Preflight_Separation_Guardrails_Summary
observations: Separation enforced via: runtime guard, static lint, DB invariants, preflight table variant, fixed tag 'preflight'
Tests avoid outputs artifacts; CI test validates guard + latest preflight helper
Next: wire lint into CI; document policy + helper APIs

entities.name: Preflight_Policy_Context
observations: Active context: enforcing strict separation between preflight and real runs; DB-backed logging only; no outputs artifacts from preflight tests
Latest changes: fixed-tag policy; latest-preflight helper; CI guard test; lint whitelist for enforcement test

entities.name: Stamp_Proposal_Helper
observations: Usage: stamps Salted Provenance header and prereg salted_provenance

entities.name: Provenance_Gating_OptIn
observations: Manifests: require_provenance=true enables hard salted hash checks (proposal header + prereg) in [approval.py](Derivation/code/common/authorization/approval.py:1)

entities.name: No_Approvals_By_Assistant
observations: Decision: approvals and secrets are human-only; assistant must not modify approval DB or approval_key (see [decisionLog.md](memory-bank/decisionLog.md:1))

entities.name: CEG_T4_Assisted_Echo_G1_G3_G4_Fixes
observations: G1 instrument: per-step J roundtrip meter [assisted_echo.py](Derivation/code/physics/metriplectic/assisted_echo.py:102)
G3 clamp: symmetric per-step budget accounting [assisted_echo.py](Derivation/code/physics/metriplectic/assisted_echo.py:241)
